title: i pick fiddles. riot gives me sons. why is this allowed to exist?
body:
SONA*

how can you let such a game breaking bug ruin my game for my self and 4 teammates . 3rd time in a matter of weeks its happened

replies.body: dont post here about it, send a support ticket (top right corner). first thing you should do is repair your client
cost me another game even though  i played godly sons top
